name: Vanilla Coffee Cream
description:
A simple creamy vanilla coffee. 

FLV Biscotti is the base coffee note - the INW Shisha and French Vanilla Ice Cream are meant to be the main vanilla notes but a small percentage of FLV Cream and FA Custard premium give this more body while adding the McCafe/Tim Hortons coffee feel.  

3 days max steep IMO but good on the shake.
author: Aritria

reviews.text: Ive heard biscotti works as a coffee, and this recipe proves it. Balanced perfectly with the vanilla, and no burnt popcorn notes. Beautifully done.
This is absolutely amazing.  I put it on my mag stirrer for a while today, and went ahead and tasted tonight.  Wow, delicious!  This is one of my favorite coffee vapes so far.  Well done!
